sk1.name: Fireblast
sk1.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

sk2.name: Ignite
sk2.desc: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

sk3.name: Bloodlust
sk3.desc: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed.

sk4.name: Unrefined Fireblast
sk4.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

sk5.name: Multicast
sk5.desc: Enables the Ogre Magi to rapidly cast his spells, giving them greater potency. Gives a chance to cast a spell multiple times in one cast. Increases Fireblast's mana cost and decreases its cooldown, adds an area of effect to Ignite and reduces Bloodlust's cooldown and gives it a chance to cast on random allies around Ogre Magi.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
